Source.Name: fping
Source.Summary: fping is a program like ping which uses the Internet Control Message Protocol
Source.Description: fping is a program to send ICMP echo probes to network hosts, similar to ping, but much better performing when pinging multiple hosts.

Package.Name: fping
Package.Summary: fping is a program like ping which uses the Internet Control Message Protocol
Package.Description: fping is a program to send ICMP echo probes to network hosts, similar to ping, but much better performing when pinging multiple hosts.
